extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to send/receive tabs and other messages between devices, from WebExtensions addons.

syncAvailable_notification_title.message: Messages from addons are sendable to other devices now.

syncAvailable_notification_message.message: Messages from addons can be transferred between your devices. Please click here to set an identifiable name to this device.

syncAvailable_notification_message_linux.message: Messages from addons can be transferred between your devices. Please click the button to set an identifiable name to this device.
